Articles.Content:
err.... Why does my computer always say that I don't have the authority to delete any KSP-related folder when I AM the Administrator?

OS: windows 10? I tried unlocker, Take Ownership and much more.

(if i start the game, the load bar says "Loading Asset Bundle Definition" forever at 0%.)

If you're launching from steam, right click on the game, select "delete local content", then try to reinstall the game.

With windows, you can uninstall the game through control panel (i believe) search "remove" and something like "add or remove programs" will pop up. Type in KSP, and delete it. If that doesn't work, I don't know what will.

 

I hope my suggestions will help!

Cheers!!

 

-TheKorbinger
Great! Reinstalling the game helped a lot. Now I can delete and copy all my folders. Thanks!!!
